mc.name: Flowstone Charger
mc.oracleText: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.

mc.name: Yavimaya's Embrace
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
mc.printedText:
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

mc.name: Vindicate
mc.oracleText: Destroy target permanent.
mc.printedText: Destroy target permanent.
mc.flavorText:
"Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
--Gerrard

mc.name: Consume Strength
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.

mc.name: Angelfire Crusader
mc.oracleText: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

mc.name: Wild Research
mc.oracleText:
{1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
{1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random from your hand. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random from your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Powerstone Minefield
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.
mc.flavorText:
"We have fought this far and lost too much. We will not turn back."
--Grizzlegom

mc.name: Caves of Koilos
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Battlefield Forge
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Llanowar Wastes
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Yavimaya Coast
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Shivan Reef
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Overgrown Estate
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: The decay of Crovax's ancestral home matched the state of his soul.

mc.name: Martyrs' Tomb
mc.oracleText: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
mc.flavorText:
Honor the brave who fought,
Honor the dead who fell,
Honor the world they saved.
--Memorial inscription

mc.name: Captain's Maneuver
mc.oracleText: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.
mc.printedText: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.
mc.flavorText: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

mc.name: Temporal Spring
mc.oracleText: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

mc.name: Death Mutation
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.

mc.name: Dega Disciple
mc.oracleText:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."

mc.name: Ceta Disciple
mc.oracleText:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

mc.name: Necra Disciple
mc.oracleText:
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText:
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: "The darkness merely hides the light."

mc.name: Raka Disciple
mc.oracleText:
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "The strong can also be subtle."

mc.name: Ana Disciple
mc.oracleText:
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."

mc.name: Planar Despair
mc.oracleText: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.

mc.name: Haunted Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Haunted Angel is put into a graveyard from play, remove Haunted Angel from the game and each other player puts a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Haunted Angel is put into a graveyard from play, remove Haunted Angel from the game and each other player puts a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying into play.

mc.name: Degavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R}
If the {1}{B} kicker cost was paid, Degavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If the {R} kicker cost was paid, Degavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R}
If you paid the {1}{B} kicker cost, Degavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and has "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If you paid the {R} kicker cost, Degavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and has first strike.

mc.name: Cetavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G}
If the {1}{R} kicker cost was paid, Cetavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
If the {G} kicker cost was paid, Cetavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G}
If you paid the {1}{R} kicker cost, Cetavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and has first strike.
If you paid the {G} kicker cost, Cetavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and has trample.

mc.name: Necravolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W}
If the {1}{G} kicker cost was paid, Necravolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.
If the {W} kicker cost was paid, Necravolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with lifelink. (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W}
If you paid the {1}{G} kicker cost, Necravolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and has trample.
If you paid the {W} kicker cost, Necravolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and has "Whenever Necravolver deals damage, you gain that much life."

mc.name: Rakavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U}
If the {1}{W} kicker cost was paid, Rakavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with lifelink. (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
If the {U} kicker cost was paid, Rakavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U}
If you paid the {1}{W} kicker cost, Rakavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and has "Whenever Rakavolver deals damage, you gain that much life."
If you paid the {U} kicker cost, Rakavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and has flying.

mc.name: Anavolver
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B}
If the {1}{U} kicker cost was paid, Anavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.
If the {B} kicker cost was paid, Anavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B}
If you paid the {1}{U} kicker cost, Anavolver comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it and has flying.
If you paid the {B} kicker cost, Anavolver comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it and has "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."

mc.name: Pernicious Deed
mc.oracleText: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
mc.printedText: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
mc.flavorText: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

mc.name: Penumbra Kavu
mc.oracleText: When Penumbra Kavu is put into a graveyard from play, put a 3/3 black Kavu creature token into play.
mc.printedText: When Penumbra Kavu is put into a graveyard from play, put a 3/3 black Kavu creature token into play.
mc.flavorText:
"These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die."
--Tahngarth

mc.name: Index
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
mc.flavorText: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

mc.name: Savage Gorilla
mc.oracleText: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: These omnivorous gorillas have no qualms about a diet composed of equal parts fruit and Phyrexians.

mc.name: Desolation Angel
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you play this spell.)

Flying

When Desolation Angel comes into play, destroy all lands you control. If the kicker cost was paid, destroy all lands instead.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you play this spell.)
Flying
When Desolation Angel comes into play, destroy all lands you control. If you paid the kicker cost, destroy all lands instead.

mc.name: Evasive Action
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
mc.flavorText: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

mc.name: Emblazoned Golem
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you play this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If the kicker cost was paid, Emblazoned Golem comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you play this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If you paid the kicker cost, Emblazoned Golem comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.

mc.name: Coalition Honor Guard
mc.oracleText: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls is put onto the stack, if that spell or ability could target a Flagbearer in play but doesn't, that opponent changes one of its targets to a Flagbearer.
mc.printedText: If an opponent plays a spell or ability that could target a Flagbearer in play, that player chooses at least one Flagbearer as a target.
mc.flavorText: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

mc.name: Quicksilver Dagger
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."
mc.flavorText: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

mc.name: Mystic Snake
mc.oracleText:
Flash (You may play this spell any time you could play an instant.)
When Mystic Snake comes into play, counter target spell.
mc.printedText:
You may play Mystic Snake any time you could play an instant.
When Mystic Snake comes into play, counter target spell.
mc.flavorText: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

mc.name: Legacy Weapon
mc.oracleText:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Remove target permanent from the game.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
mc.printedText:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Remove target permanent from the game.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

mc.name: Illuminate
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you play this spell.)

Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If the {2}{R} kicker cost was paid, Illuminate deals X damage to that creature's controller. If the {3}{U} kicker cost was paid, you draw X cards.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you play this spell.)
Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If you paid the {2}{R} kicker cost, Illuminate deals X damage to that creature's controller. If you paid the {3}{U} kicker cost, you draw X cards.

mc.name: Ice Cave
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
mc.flavorText: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.

mc.name: Spectral Lynx
mc.oracleText:
Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.
mc.printedText:
Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.
mc.flavorText: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.

mc.name: Dwarven Patrol
mc.oracleText:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you play a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.
mc.printedText:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you play a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.
mc.flavorText: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.

mc.name: Jaded Response
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."
--Sisay

mc.name: Night
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Day
mc.oracleText: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian Gargantua comes into play, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Phyrexian Gargantua comes into play, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

mc.name: Urborg Elf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.

mc.name: Tranquil Path
mc.oracleText:
Destroy all enchantments.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

mc.name: Dodecapod
mc.oracleText: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it into play with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod from your hand, put it into play with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

mc.name: Dragon Arch
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand into play.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Put a multicolored creature card from your hand into play.
mc.flavorText: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.

mc.name: Fungal Shambler
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

mc.name: Razorfin Hunter
mc.oracleText: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.

mc.name: Gaea's Skyfolk
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.

mc.name: Putrid Warrior
mc.oracleText: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one - each player loses 1 life; or each player gains 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one each player loses 1 life; or each player gains 1 life.
mc.flavorText: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."

mc.name: Llanowar Dead
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Just as leaves fall from the branches of a living tree, so too do the dead leave the elfhame.

mc.name: Goblin Legionnaire
mc.oracleText:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

mc.name: Unnatural Selection
mc.oracleText: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature's type becomes that type until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: What nature makes, magic can modify.

mc.name: Standard Bearer
mc.oracleText: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls is put onto the stack, if that spell or ability could target a Flagbearer in play but doesn't, that opponent changes one of its targets to a Flagbearer.
mc.printedText: If an opponent plays a spell or ability that could target a Flagbearer in play, that player chooses at least one Flagbearer as a target.
mc.flavorText: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

mc.name: Squee's Embrace
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that creature card to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Manacles of Decay
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.

mc.name: Coalition Flag
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer.
Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls is put onto the stack, if that spell or ability could target a Flagbearer in play but doesn't, that opponent changes one of its targets to a Flagbearer.
mc.printedText:
Coalition Flag can enchant only a creature you control.
Enchanted creature's type is Flagbearer.
If an opponent plays a spell or ability that could target a Flagbearer in play, that player chooses at least one Flagbearer as a target.

mc.name: Gerrard Capashen
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Play this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Play this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

mc.name: Living Airship
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.
mc.flavorText: The ship has a crew of three: the pilot, the gunner, and the ship itself.

mc.name: Jilt
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you play this spell.)

Return target creature to its owner's hand. If the kicker cost was paid, Jilt deals 2 damage to another target creature.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you play this spell.)
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you paid the kicker cost, Jilt deals 2 damage to another target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"You're not my Hanna"
--Gerrard, to Yawgmoth

mc.name: Mournful Zombie
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Treated with a powerful mix of herbs and potions, its wrappings have a remarkable preservative effect, even for the living.

mc.name: Zombie Boa
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.flavorText: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.

mc.name: Urborg Uprising
mc.oracleText:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

mc.name: Tundra Kavu
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target land becomes a plains or an island until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

mc.name: Bloodfire Dwarf
mc.oracleText: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
mc.printedText: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
mc.flavorText: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

mc.name: Kavu Glider
mc.oracleText:
{W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Dwarven Landslide
mc.oracleText:
Kicker-{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)

Destroy target land. If the kicker cost was paid, destroy another target land.
mc.printedText:
Kicker--{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)
Destroy target land. If you paid the kicker cost, destroy another target land.

mc.name: Penumbra Bobcat
mc.oracleText: When Penumbra Bobcat is put into a graveyard from play, put a 2/1 black Cat creature token into play.
mc.printedText: When Penumbra Bobcat is put into a graveyard from play, put a 2/1 black Cat creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

mc.name: Lay of the Land
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

mc.name: Soul Link
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature deals or is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
mc.flavorText: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

mc.name: Ana Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

mc.name: Squee's Revenge
mc.oracleText: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.
mc.printedText: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

mc.name: Dead Ringers
mc.oracleText: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

mc.name: Minotaur Tactician
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.
mc.printedText:
Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.

mc.name: Helionaut
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

mc.name: Vodalian Mystic
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
mc.flavorText:
"Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."
--Sisay

mc.name: Necra Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.

mc.name: Divine Light
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."
--Lord Windgrace

mc.name: Bog Gnarr
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

mc.name: Glade Gnarr
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

mc.name: Tahngarth's Glare
mc.oracleText: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

mc.name: Reef Shaman
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target land's type becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

mc.name: Symbiotic Deployment
mc.oracleText:
Skip your draw step.

{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."
--Eladamri

mc.name: Death
mc.oracleText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

mc.name: Life

mc.printedText: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

mc.printedText: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact.

mc.printedText: Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

mc.printedText: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

mc.printedText: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Chaos

mc.printedText: Creatures can't block this turn.

mc.name: Guided Passage

mc.printedText: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Mind Extraction
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Mind Extraction, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Mind Extraction, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors from it.

mc.name: Ceta Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card from your hand.

mc.name: Dega Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.

mc.name: Raka Sanctuary
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.

mc.name: Prophetic Bolt

mc.printedText: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

mc.printedText: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.
mc.flavorText: As the druids had devoted their lives to preserving Dominaria, so did they devote their deaths.

mc.name: Last Stand
mc.oracleText: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.
mc.printedText: Target opponent loses 2 life for each swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage equal to the number of mountains you control to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each forest you control. You gain 2 life for each plains you control. Draw a card for each island you control, then discard that many cards from your hand.

Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana to your mana pool add that much white mana instead. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color.

Flying

mc.printedText: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens into play.

mc.printedText: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
